participant_1.background:
I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i still dream about going to paris and designing clothes.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my famous stews that are always a hit at parties.
i like to donate time at the local animal shelter.
Leaving my father behind when I immigrated to the United States.
I drive my Ford Taurus to work, daydreaming about living in another country.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.

content.text: Hello, I am a mother of two beautiful boys and I love to cook healthy meals for my family!
That's so nice! I love to cook too, I'm known for my famous stews. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love to make pasta, but I've been trying to learn more about the gambling business, so I've been eating a lot of salad and chicken.
That's so cool! I love to gamble, I drive my Ford Taurus to work, daydreaming about living in another country.
Wow, that's interesting! I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
That sounds amazing! I'd love to live in the suburbs, but I live in the city right now. I love it here, but I do miss the peace and quiet sometimes.
I think it's important to find a balance between the two. I love the convenience of living in the city, but I also love being able to get away from it all and relax in the suburbs.
That's a great point! I think I'll have to start looking into moving to the suburbs.
I think you'd like it there
